metrics.name: ERC-20 Transactions Count
metrics.description: The sum count of transactions that resulted in any ERC-20 activity in that interval. Contracts that contain all of the following are considered to be ERC-20 contracts: the balanceOf function, the transfer function, and the Transfer event hash. Only Transfer or Approval events are counted as activity. If a transaction results in more than 1 transfer or approval, it’s only counted once.

values_schema.transaction_count_erc20: The sum count of transactions that resulted in any ERC-20 activity in that interval. Contracts that contain all of the following are considered to be ERC-20 contracts: the balanceOf function, the transfer function, and the Transfer event hash. Only Transfer or Approval events are counted as activity. If a transaction results in more than 1 transfer or approval, it’s only counted once.

metrics.name: Real Volume
metrics.description: It is well known that many exchanges conduct wash trading practices in order to inflate trading volume. They are incentivized to report inflated volumes in order to attract traders. "Real Volume" refers to the total volume on the exchanges that we believe with high level of confidence are free of wash trading activities. However, that does not necessarily mean that the volume reported by other exchanges is 100% wash trades. As such, the Messari "Real Volume" applies a penalty to these exchanges to discount the volume believed to come from wash trading activity. For more information, see our methodology page.

values_schema.volume: The total volume traded during the specified interval across all Messari method markets in US dollars

metrics.name: Average Difficulty
metrics.description: The mean difficulty of finding a hash that meets the protocol-designated requirement (i.e., the difficulty of finding a new block) that interval. The requirement is unique to each applicable cryptocurrency protocol.

values_schema.mean_difficulty: The mean difficulty during the specified interval. A higher difficulty indicates a lower likelihood of finding a hash which meets the protocol-requirement of finding a new block.

metrics.name: Total Miner Revenue
metrics.description: The sum USD value of all miner revenue (fees plus newly issued native units) for all time from genesis up to the end of that interval.

values_schema.miner_revenue_total: The sum USD value of all miner revenue (fees plus newly issued native units) for all time from genesis up to the end of that interval.

metrics.name: Circulating Supply
metrics.description: The circulating supply acknowledges that tokens may be held by projects/foundations which have no intent to sell down their positions, but which have not locked up supply in a formal contract. Thus, circulating supply does not include known project treasury holdings (which can be significant). Note that an investor must carefully consider both liquid and circulating supplies when evaluating an asset, and the two can vary significantly. A risk of depending entirely on circulating supply is that the number can change dramatically based on discretionary sales from project treasuries.

values_schema.circulating_supply: The circulating supply of the asset is the total supply of the asset not locked into legal contracts, smart contracts, or held in treasury wallets.

metrics.name: Total Fees
metrics.description: The sum USD value of all fees paid to miners that interval. Fees do not include new issuance.

values_schema.fees_total_usd: The sum USD value of all fees paid to miners that interval.

metrics.name: 1 Year Active Supply (%)
metrics.description: The percentage of the current supply that has been active in the trailing 1 year up to the end of that interval.

values_schema.supply_active_1y_percent: The percentage of the current supply that has been active in the trailing 1 year up to the end of that interval.

metrics.name: Supply in addresses with balance greater than 100 native units
metrics.description: The sum of all native units being held in addresses whose balance was 100 native units or greater at the end of that interval. Only native units are considered (e.g., an address with less than X ETH but with more than X in ERC-20 tokens would not be considered).

values_schema.supply_in_addr_above_bal_100: The sum of all native units being held in addresses whose balance was 100 native units or greater at the end of that interval. Only native units are considered (e.g., an address with less than X ETH but with more than X in ERC-20 tokens would not be considered).

metrics.name: Supply One Hop from Miners
metrics.description: The sum of the balances of all addresses within one hop of a mining entity in USD. An address within one hop of a mining entity is defined as an address that has been credited from a transaction debiting the 'FEES' or 'ISSUANCE' accounts, or any address that has been credited in a transaction sent by such an address.

values_schema.miner_supply_1hop_usd: The sum of the balances of all addresses within one hop of a mining entity in USD. An address within one hop of a mining entity is defined as an address that has been credited from a transaction debiting the 'FEES' or 'ISSUANCE' accounts, or any address that has been credited in a transaction sent by such an address.

metrics.name: Miner Revenue (Native Units)
metrics.description: The sum of all miner revenue, which constitutes fees plus newly issued native units.

values_schema.revenue_native: The sum of all miner revenue, which constitutes fees plus newly issued native units.

metrics.name: 90 Days Active Supply
metrics.description: The sum of unique native units that transacted at least once in the trailing 90 days up to the end of that interval. Native units that transacted more than once are only counted once.

values_schema.supply_active_90d: The sum of unique native units that transacted at least once in the trailing 90 days up to the end of that interval. Native units that transacted more than once are only counted once.

metrics.name: Transaction Volume (Native Units)
metrics.description: The sum of native units transferred (i.e., the aggregate size of all transfers) between distinct addresses that interval.

values_schema.transaction_volume: The sum of native units transferred (i.e., the aggregate size of all transfers) between distinct addresses that interval.

metrics.name: Addresses with balance greater than 0.01 native units
metrics.description: The sum count of unique addresses holding at least 0.01 native units as of the end of that interval. Only native units are considered (e.g., an address with less than X ETH but with more than X in ERC-20 tokens would not be considered).

values_schema.addresses: The sum count of unique addresses holding at least 0.01 native units as of the end of that interval. Only native units are considered (e.g., an address with less than X ETH but with more than X in ERC-20 tokens would not be considered).

metrics.name: Supply on Bitfinex (Native Units)
metrics.description: The sum in native units held by Bitfinex at the end of that interval.

values_schema.exchange_supply_bitfinex: The sum in native units held by Bitfinex at the end of that interval.

metrics.name: Supply in addresses with balance greater than 100K native units
metrics.description: The sum of all native units being held in addresses whose balance was 100K native units or greater at the end of that interval. Only native units are considered (e.g., an address with less than X ETH but with more than X in ERC-20 tokens would not be considered).

values_schema.supply_in_addr_above_bal_100k: The sum of all native units being held in addresses whose balance was 100K native units or greater at the end of that interval. Only native units are considered (e.g., an address with less than X ETH but with more than X in ERC-20 tokens would not be considered).

metrics.name: Supply Revived in Last 90 Days
metrics.description: The sum of all native unit balances last active at least 90 days ago that became active in this interval.

values_schema.supply_revived_90d: The sum of all native unit balances last active at least 90 days ago that became active in this interval.

metrics.name: Supply Shielded
metrics.description: The sum of all native units being held in shielded pool(s).

values_schema.supply_shielded: The sum of all native units being held in shielded pool(s).

metrics.name: Huobi Net Flows
metrics.description: The net USD value sent or withdrawn to/from Huobi that interval.

values_schema.exchange_flow_net_huobi_usd: The net USD value sent or withdrawn to/from Huobi that interval.

metrics.name: Gemini Withdrawals (Native Units)
metrics.description: The sum in native units withdrawn from Gemini that interval.

values_schema.exchange_flow_out_gemini: The sum in native units withdrawn from Gemini that interval.

metrics.name: Total Fees (Native Units)
metrics.description: The sum of all fees paid to miners in native units. Fees do not include new issuance.

values_schema.fees_total: The sum of all fees paid to miners in native units

metrics.name: Contract Calls Count
metrics.description: The sum count of contract calls executed across all transactions in that interval. A contract call is the invocation of a contract’s code by another contract or non-contract address. Failed invocations are counted. A single transaction can result in multiple contract calls.

values_schema.transaction_count_contract_calls: The sum count of contract calls executed across all transactions in that interval. A contract call is the invocation of a contract’s code by another contract or non-contract address. Failed invocations are counted. A single transaction can result in multiple contract calls.

values_schema.supply_revived_2y: The sum of all native unit balances last active at least 2 years ago that became active in this interval.

metrics.description: The mean gas limit per transaction that interval.

values_schema.transaction_gas_limit_avg: The mean gas limit per transaction that interval.

metrics.name: Addresses with balance greater than 100 native units
metrics.description: The sum count of unique addresses holding at least 100 native units as of the end of that interval. Only native units are considered (e.g., an address with less than X ETH but with more than X in ERC-20 tokens would not be considered).

metrics.name: ERC-721 Transfer Count
metrics.description: The sum count of ERC-721 transfers in that interval. Only transfers between two distinct addresses are counted. ERC-165 is used to determine a contract’s compliance with ERC-721.

values_schema.transaction_transfer_count_erc721: The sum count of ERC-721 transfers in that interval. Only transfers between two distinct addresses are counted. ERC-165 is used to determine a contract’s compliance with ERC-721.

metrics.name: Addresses with balance greater than $10K
metrics.description: The sum count of unique addresses holding at least ten thousand dollars' worth of native units as of the end of that interval. Only native units are considered (e.g., an address with less than X ETH but with more than X in ERC-20 tokens would not be considered).

values_schema.addresses: The sum count of unique addresses holding at least ten thousand dollars' worth of native units as of the end of that interval. Only native units are considered (e.g., an address with less than X ETH but with more than X in ERC-20 tokens would not be considered).

metrics.name: Uncle Blocks Count
metrics.description: The sum count of uncle blocks mined in that interval.

values_schema.block_uncle_count: The sum count of uncle blocks mined in that interval.

metrics.name: Block Weight
metrics.description: The sum of the weights of all blocks created in that interval. Weight is a dimensionless measure of a block’s “size”. It is only applicable for chains that use SegWit (segregated witness).

values_schema.block_weight: The sum of the weights of all blocks created in that interval. Weight is a dimensionless measure of a block’s “size”. It is only applicable for chains that use SegWit (segregated witness).

metrics.name: Supply One Hop from Miners (Native Units)
metrics.description: The sum of the balances of all addresses within one hop of a mining entity. An address within one hop of a mining entity is defined as an address that has been credited from a transaction debiting the 'FEES' or 'ISSUANCE' accounts, or any address that has been credited in a transaction sent by such an address.

values_schema.miner_supply_1hop: The sum of the balances of all addresses within one hop of a mining entity. An address within one hop of a mining entity is defined as an address that has been credited from a transaction debiting the 'FEES' or 'ISSUANCE' accounts, or any address that has been credited in a transaction sent by such an address.

metrics.name: Supply in addresses with balance greater than $1K
metrics.description: The sum of all native units being held in addresses whose balance was $1K or greater at the end of that interval. Only native units are considered (e.g., an address with less than X ETH but with more than X in ERC-20 tokens would not be considered).

values_schema.supply_in_addr_above_bal_1k_usd: The sum of all native units being held in addresses whose balance was $1K or greater at the end of that interval. Only native units are considered (e.g., an address with less than X ETH but with more than X in ERC-20 tokens would not be considered).

metrics.name: Circulating Marketcap
metrics.description: The circulating marketcap is the price of the asset multiplied by the circulating supply. If no price is found for an asset because no trades occurred, the last price of the last trade is used. After 30 days with no trades, a marketcap of 0 is reported until trading resumes.

values_schema.circulating_marketcap: The circulating marketcap in US dollars.

metrics.name: Adjusted RVT 90-days MA
metrics.description: The ratio of the network's realized value to the 90-day moving average of the adjusted transfer value. Also referred to as RVT.

values_schema.rvt_adjusted_90d_ma: The ratio of the network's realized value to the 90-day moving average of the adjusted transfer value. Also referred to as RVT.

metrics.name: Addresses with balance greater than 1M native units
metrics.description: The sum count of unique addresses holding at least 1,000,000 native units as of the end of that interval. Only native units are considered (e.g., an address with less than X ETH but with more than X in ERC-20 tokens would not be considered).

values_schema.addresses: The sum count of unique addresses holding at least 1,000,000 native units as of the end of that interval. Only native units are considered (e.g., an address with less than X ETH but with more than X in ERC-20 tokens would not be considered).

metrics.name: Supply in top 1% addresses
metrics.description: The sum of all native units held by the richest 1% of addresses at the end of that interval.

values_schema.supply_top_1_percent: The sum of all native units held by the richest 1% of addresses at the end of that interval.

metrics.name: Total Gas Limit
metrics.description: The sum gas limit of all transactions that interval.

values_schema.exchange_supply_binance_usd: The sum USD value held by Binance at the end of that interval.

metrics.name: Realized Marketcap
metrics.description: The sum USD value based on the USD closing price on the day that a native unit last moved (i.e., last transacted) for all native units.

values_schema.marketcap_realized: The sum USD value based on the USD closing price on the day that a native unit last moved (i.e., last transacted) for all native units.

metrics.name: Circulating Supply (CoinGecko)
metrics.description: The circulating supply acknowledges that tokens may be held by projects/foundations which have no intent to sell down their positions, but which have not locked up supply in a formal contract. Thus, circulating supply does not include known project treasury holdings (which can be significant). Note that an investor must carefully consider both liquid and circulating supplies when evaluating an asset, and the two can vary significantly. A risk of depending entirely on circulating supply is that the number can change dramatically based on discretionary sales from project treasuries.

values_schema.circulating_supply: The circulating supply of the asset is the total supply of the asset not locked into legal contracts, smart contracts, or held in treasury wallets.

metrics.description: The USD value of the mean miner reward per estimated hash unit performed during the period, also known as hashprice. The unit of hashpower measurement depends on the protocol.

metrics.name: ERC-20 Transfer Count
metrics.description: The sum count of ERC-20 transfers in that interval. Only non-zero transfers between two distinct addresses are counted. Contracts that contain all of the following are considered to be ERC-20 contracts: the balanceOf function, the transfer function, and the Transfer event hash.

values_schema.transaction_transfer_count_erc20: The sum count of ERC-20 transfers in that interval. Only non-zero transfers between two distinct addresses are counted. Contracts that contain all of the following are considered to be ERC-20 contracts: the balanceOf function, the transfer function, and the Transfer event hash.
